list-item.p: Fungi and mouldâ€”different types are especially related to floods, water damage, etc. and to contamination of medical products and equipment [ 39, 40]. Especially, the newly defined Candida auris may be very virulent.
Prion disease-new Shy-Drager syndrome is rediscovered in 2015; Multiple-system atrophy (MSA) [ 5, 41].
Ricin is a plant-derived toxin that is still used for bioterrorism in letters to, among others, President Obama [ 42].
